qas.question: How many semi-finalists were there in season 4?

How many men were in the top twelve on season five of American Idol?
How many women were in the top twelve on season nine of American Idol?
How many women were semi-finalists on season six of American Idol?

context: From seasons four to seven and nine, the <a0_0>twenty-four<a0_0/> semi-finalists were divided <a1_0>by gender<a1_0/> in order to ensure an equal gender division in the top <a4_0>twelve<a4_0/>. The men and women sang separately on consecutive nights, and the bottom two in each groups were eliminated each week until only <a2_0><a3_0>six<a3_0/><a2_0/> of each remained to form the top twelve.
